subject: Cricket
lead_paragraph: DNA samples taken from the body of the former Pakistan coach Bob Woolmer will be retested, extending the inquest into his death into a fourth week. Woolmer was found unconscious March 18 in his hotel room in Jamaica, a day after his Pakistan team lost to Ireland in the Cricket World Cup. Woolmer was pronounced dead at a local hospital, but an autopsy ruled that he had been murdered, sparking a manhunt by the Jamaican police until a review reversed the findings.
